article_title: Leaders of Mexico, Japan tour Teotihuacan archaeological site
article_text: - Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe toured the ancient city of Teotihuacan Saturday, one day after they signed bilateral accords that included an energy deal. ()
